price: 24. Inuusan qof miskiin ah idiin soo gelin maanta (beerta, waxnana siin).
arabic: أَن لَّا يَدۡخُلَنَّهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّسۡكِينٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: an lā yadkhulannahā al-yawma ʿalaykum mis'kīnun
